#NEBHInjuryReport: After a medical evaluation by Celtics/Cavs medical personnel Gordon Hayward has been diagnosed w/ a fractured left ankle.

骨折要睇下extra-articular定intra-articular , 即係骨折位置連唔連落個關節度
如果係intra-articular 即係骨折連落關節度, 咁點都會傷埋個joint capsule (包住關節的軟組織) 同埋傷韌帶
所以唔一定骨折就pure骨折, 就好過傷軟組織
